name: AlpsDecompNodeDesc
brief:
ALPS node descriptor storing branching bounds

AlpsDecompNodeDesc derives from AlpsNodeDesc to store the
description of a tree node for serialization and reconstruction.

**Storage:**
DIP doesn't use full differencing (delta encoding), so node
descriptions primarily store bound changes from branching:
- Variable lower/upper bound modifications
- Warm start basis (optional)

**Key Methods:**
- encode(): Serialize to AlpsEncoded for transmission
- decode(): Reconstruct from encoded form

**ALPS Integration:**
- Each AlpsDecompTreeNode has an AlpsDecompNodeDesc
- Used for checkpointing and parallel distribution
- Compact representation for tree storage
see: AlpsDecompTreeNode.h for the tree node using this
